name: Snow Leopard
clues: I have thick fur to survive in cold climates.
I live in high mountainous regions.
I am rarely seen in the wild.
I have a long tail that helps with balance.
I am an endangered species.

name: Koala
clues: I sleep most of the day.
I only eat eucalyptus leaves.
I live in Australia.
I carry my babies in a pouch.
I am often mistaken for a bear.

name: Seahorse
clues: I have a horse-like head.
I swim upright.
Males carry the babies.
I cling to seaweed with my tail.
I am very small and shy.

name: Platypus
clues: I lay eggs but I’m not a bird.
I have a duck-like bill.
I live in Australia.
I swim using webbed feet.
I am a mammal.

name: Griffin
clues: I have the body of a lion and head of an eagle.
I am a mythical creature.
I guard treasure in ancient stories.
I can fly and roar.
I appear in many fantasy tales.

name: Reindeer
clues: I live in cold, snowy regions.
I am associated with pulling sleighs.
I have large antlers.
Both males and females can have antlers.
I am featured in winter holiday stories.

name: Turkey
clues: I am often seen around Thanksgiving.
I have a fan-shaped tail.
I make a gobbling sound.
I can fly short distances.
I am a farm bird.

name: Sloth
clues: I move very slowly.
I spend most of my life in trees.
I have long claws.
I sleep up to 20 hours a day.
I am native to Central and South America.

name: Chameleon
clues: I can change my skin color.
I have a long, sticky tongue.
My eyes move independently.
I am an expert at camouflage.
I live in trees in warm climates.

name: Moose
clues: I have large, broad antlers.
I am the largest member of the deer family.
I am good at swimming.
I make grunting sounds.
I live in North American forests.

name: Camel
clues: I have humps on my back.
I can survive for days without water.
I am often used as transportation in deserts.
I have long eyelashes and nostrils that close.
I live in hot, dry environments.

name: Axolotl
clues: I am a type of salamander.
I never grow out of my larval stage.
I can regenerate limbs.
I live underwater my whole life.
I am native to lakes in Mexico.

name: Phoenix
clues: I am a mythical bird.
I burst into flames and am reborn.
I symbolize renewal and immortality.
I appear in legends across cultures.
I rise from my ashes.

name: Walrus
clues: I have long tusks and whiskers.
I live in cold Arctic regions.
I can weigh over a ton.
I spend time on ice and in the water.
I use my tusks to haul out of the ocean.

name: Fairy
clues: I am a magical creature.
I have wings and can fly.
I am often depicted as tiny and glowing.
I appear in bedtime stories and folklore.
Sometimes I leave sparkles behind me.

name: Octopus
clues: I have eight arms.
I can squeeze through tiny spaces.
I can change my color to camouflage.
I squirt ink when threatened.
I am very intelligent for an invertebrate.

name: Jellyfish
clues: I have a soft, see-through body.
I can sting with my tentacles.
I drift with ocean currents.
I don’t have a brain or heart.
I have been around for millions of years.

name: Blue Whale
clues: I am the largest animal on Earth.
I breathe air but live in water.
I eat tiny shrimp-like creatures called krill.
My songs can travel long distances underwater.
I am a gentle giant of the sea.

name: Clownfish
clues: I am orange with white stripes.

I was made famous by a movie.
I am a very small fish.
I can change from male to female.

name: Manta Ray
clues: I have a flat, diamond-shaped body.
I glide through the water like a bird.
I am often seen in tropical oceans.
I feed by filtering plankton.
I am gentle despite my size.

name: Cow
clues: I produce milk.
I often wear a bell around my neck.
I say 'moo'.
I have four stomach compartments.
I am raised for meat and dairy.

name: Pig
clues: I love rolling in mud.
I make an 'oink' sound.
I am highly intelligent.
I have a curly tail.
I am raised for pork.

name: Chicken
clues: I lay eggs.

I have a comb on my head.
I am commonly raised in coops.
I can flap but not fly far.

name: Sheep
clues: I grow wool.
I say 'baa'.

I am known for flocking behavior.
I am raised for wool and meat.

name: Goat
clues: I can climb steep hills and mountains.

I eat almost anything.

name: Tiger
clues: I have orange fur with black stripes.

I am one of the largest big cats.
I often hunt alone at night.
I can swim very well.

name: Monkey
clues: I am very playful and curious.

I am a primate.

name: Jaguar
clues: I have a spotted coat.

I am a powerful climber and swimmer.
I have one of the strongest bites among cats.

name: Toucan
clues: I have a huge colorful beak.

name: Gorilla

I am mostly herbivorous.

name: Dog
clues: I am known as 'man's best friend'.

name: Cat
clues: I purr when I’m content.

name: Hamster

name: Goldfish

name: Parrot
